bibl.title: From Egypt to Constantinople: a Pilgrimage Route in a Forgotten Late Antique Itinerary (SB XXVI 16607)?
bibl.note: Expanded version of a talk given at the 27th International Congress of Papyrology, University of Warsaw, on 31 July 2013. - P. Minnesota Inv. 400 [formerly: P. Coll. privées: P. von Scherling Inv. G 110] (= M.-P.3 2274; LDAB 5976).
bibl.seg: Marco Perale, From Egypt to Constantinople: a Pilgrimage Route in a Forgotten Late Antique Itinerary (SB XXVI 16607)?
